name: Warmaiden

skills.name: Ferocious Attack
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 2.5% [Poison] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%

skills.name: Opportunity Strike
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion and places an extra hit if this attack is critical. The extra hit cannot be critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Crumbling Blast
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +159
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
